FuncDef:
The port-mode command sets a bandwidth mode for an interface.
The undo port-mode command restores the default configuration.
By default, an interface's bandwidth automatically switches according to the type of the inserted optical module.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets an interface's bandwidth mode to 25 Gbit/s.
-

Sets an interface's bandwidth mode to 10 Gbit/s.
-

Sets an interface's bandwidth mode to 1 Gbit/s.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When interconnecting interfaces that require the same bandwidth mode, you can run the port-mode command to set an interface's bandwidth.
Follow-up Procedure
After running this command, activate the port in the license view.
